description:
The main task of VIBS is to use it in the CCUNiverse mobile application as a means of payment, rewarding users.
I remind you that CCUniverse is the current UVU coin, which based on VIBS wants to create its extensive mobile application and then perform the rest of its previous assumptions.
What will this application do?
The application will present a new / different blockchain / cryptocurrency project every day.
Will choose the less known, but promising as a good investment.
In addition to coins, typically technological projects will appear: start-ups and projects that bring innovative products to the market.
We believe that investors, traders and also people who are thinking about developing or creating their business will be interested in our application.
In addition, there will be a lot of rankings and a Raffle of free coins every day.
Discovering a new project / new coin will cost $ 1 and the funds will be allocated to free coins and the development of VIBS and UVU.
name: Vibz8
